metadata.name: Hanging Land no.3
metadata.description:
At times, your land and memories are crumbling before your eyes, and you're only standing there, observing, hoping to see a sparkle of hope, no matter how small and insignificant; but alas, you will see the land that yesterday was a sanctuary for all its people, today is hanging and unstable, not unlike the dreams of its people.
Details:
6022 *4025 pixels 300dpi
Hand drawn oil painting on canvas
